about.desc: Invexix igufasha gucunga ububiko, ubucuruzi, abakozi, amadeni, raporo, n'imishahara kuri platform imwe ikomeye â€” kugira ngo umenye ibintu byose biba muri business yawe, mu gihe nyacyo.

analytics.title: Raporo n'Ubusesenguzi

notifications.title: Inyemezabwishyu n'Integuza
notifications.desc: Bona integuza ako kanya iyo ibintu bishize mu ububiko, amadeni yatinze, n'ibindi bintu by'ingenzi.

how.title: Gushyira mu Bikorwa bitagoranye
how.subtitle: Andika, gura, kandi ugenzure mu minota mike.

s1.title: Kora aho ukorera
s1.desc: Iyandikishe kandi utunganye umwirondoro w'ubucuruzi bwawe mu masegonda.

s2.title: Tunganya ibicuruzwa n'abakozi
s2.desc: Ongeramo ibicuruzwa byawe, ibyiciro, kandi utumire abagize itsinda ryawe bafite inshingano zihariye.

s3.title: Kurikirana ibikorwa imbonankubone
s3.desc: Reba ibicuruzwa n'imigendekere y'ibicuruzwa mu gihe nyacyo aho ariho hose.

s4.title: Habwa amakuru n'integuza
s4.desc: Habwa integuza zihita ziza iyo ibicuruzwa byabaye bike kandi urebe raporo z'uburyo buhanitse.

ops.title: Yubakiwe Ibikorwa Nyabyo
ops.desc: Yateguwe hagendewe ku migendekere ya business â€” atari imbonerahamwe cyangwa gukeka.

allinone.title: Platform Ihuriyeho Byose
allinone.desc: Simbuza ibikoresho byinshi na sisitemu imwe yizewe.

control.title: Ubugenzuzi bw'ako Kanya
control.desc: Fata imyanzuro ukoresheje amakuru y'ako kanya, atari raporo zarengeje igihe.

secure.title: Itekanye kandi Yizewe
secure.desc: Uruhushya rugarukira ku nshingano, amateka y'ibyakozwe, n'uburinzi bw'amakuru.

scales.title: Ikura hamwe nawe
scales.desc: Kuva ku iduka rimwe kugeza ku mashami menshi â€” Invexix ikura uko business yawe ikura.

waitlist.title: Witeguye <spanClassName>guhindura</spanClassName> business yawe?
waitlist.subtitle: Sanga umubare w'ibigo biri kwaguka hamwe n'ubugenzuzi bw'ako kanya. Shaka umwanya wawe mu gihe kizaza cy'imicungire.

who.a: Invexix igenewe amaduka y'ubucuruzi buciriritse, abacuruzi b'ibiribwa n'ibindi mu bwinshi, abatanga serivisi, n'ubucuruzi bufite amashami menshi bakeneye kugenzura ibicuruzwa, ibigurishwa, n'abakozi mu gihe nyacyo mu duce dutandukanye.

easy.a: Yego, Invexix ifite imiterere yoroshye n'uburyo bwo gutanga uburenganzira hashingiwe ku nshingano. Urashobora guhamagara abagize ikipe yawe kandi bakaba bazi gukora mu minota mike, bafite gusa uburenganzira ku byo bakeneye gukoresha.

multi.a: Cyane rwose. Invexix yubakiye ku gukura. Urashobora gukurikirana ibicuruzwa bihari, uko ibintu bigurishwa, n'ibikorwa by'abakozi mu mashami yawe yose y'ubucuruzi ukoresheje dashboard imwe ihuriye hamwe.

secure.q: Ese amakuru yanjye afite umutekano kandi aregeranywa?
secure.a: Umutekano wawe ni cyo dushyira imbere. Dukoresha uburyo buhanitse bwo kurinda amakuru (encryption), uburyo bwizewe bwo kwinjira, no kubika amakuru buri munsi (backups) kugira ngo amakuru yawe y'ubucuruzi abe afite umutekano buri gihe, aboneka, kandi arinzwe.

mobile.q: Ese nshobora kuyikoresha kuri telefone zigezweho?
mobile.a: Yego! Invexix icungwa neza kuri telefone na mudasobwa, bigufasha gukurikirana uko ubucuruzi bwawe buhagaze, kureba ibicuruzwa bihari, no guhabwa ubutumwa bw'ako kanya aho waba uri hose ku isi.

reports.a: Yego. Urashobora gukora no gukuramo raporo zose muri PDF cyangwa Excel zerekeye ibyagurishijwe, ibicuruzwa bihari, amadeni, n'uko abakozi bitwaye, bigufasha gufata imyanzuro ishingiye ku makuru kugira ngo ubucuruzi bwakure.

cases.title: Imejengwa kwa kila biashara, kila mahali.
cases.subtitle: Inabadilika kwa rejareja, jumla, huduma, vifaa na mtiririko wa kazi wa biashara.

footer.desc: Ejo hazaza h'ubumenyi bw'ubucuruzi. Cunga ibikoresho, ibururuzwa, n'ibikorwa mu kuri kwitinda.

scanMobile.tip2: Erekereza kamera kuri QR code cyangwa barcode uretse yibonere neza.
scanMobile.tip3: Iruka ko hari urumuri ruhagije kandi wirinde urumuri rwinshi ku birango.
